item.title: KSU
item.description: With Maurice van Dinther from wafl.nu Iâ€™ve created a monitoring/questionnaire tool for the Katholieke Scholenstichting Utrecht (KSU). This allows them to gain insights into how their teams are functioning. The application is build with Django and uses SSO to seamlessly allow users to gather data. The data is shown in dashboards with Chart.js.
